title: Have dead, dry skin, must I peel it off before making wudu or ghusl? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: adrian from the uk says i have a problem with dead skin don't we all so sometimes i've i have a wound i have we got fly i have something here that is dead in my elbows in my knees uh in my foot so when i perform mudu or rusul do i have to peel it off the answer is no this is part of your body this is not a layer of paint that you have brought upon yourself this is not cement this is not something that would impact your wudu this is part of your body this is your skin so washing it externally that does the job insha allah
